section_text: 1 1 The Secretary of State may, with the consent of the Treasury, acquire shares— a in British Leyland Motor Corporation Limited; and b in any company formed for the purpose of acquiring shares in British Leyland Motor Corporation Limited. 2 The aggregate of— a the sums paid by the Secretary of State for shares acquired under this Act; and b the liabilities of the Secretary of State under agreements to acquire shares under this Act; shall not exceed £265 million. 3 Any expenditure incurred by the Secretary of State in persuance of this Act shall be defrayed out of moneys provided by Parliament.
2 This Act may be cited as the British Leyland Act 1975.
